Step.name: CreateIssues
Step.Info: This step creates %count% issues under brand "%UseBrand%" with random names.

Step.name: CreateEditions
Step.Info: This step creates %count% Edition under brand "%UseBrand%" with random names.

Step.name: CreateCategories
Step.Info: This step creates %count% categories under brand "%UseBrand%" with random names.

Step.name: CreateDossiers
Step.Info: This step creates %count% dossier objects under brand "%UseBrand%" with random names.

Step.name: CreateArticles
Step.Info: This step creates %count% article objects under brand "%UseBrand%" with random names.

Step.name: CreateDossiersWithPublishForms
Step.Info: This step creates %count% dossier objects with PublishForms and placed objects under brand "%UseBrand%" with random names.
